title: Major: Admin ops polish & UX sync
description: Final admin UX polish that centralizes audit trails, modernizes buttons, and adds safer delete flows.
details: ðŸ—‚ï¸ Admin audit log coverage: create/update/delete user actions now write to `./logs/path-ai-admin-YYYY-MM-DD.log` and are downloadable via `GET /api/admin/logs?type=admin` for forensic review.
ðŸ§­ Admin widgets now share lucid button affordances: every control (api tests, log download, user creation) pairs a lucide-react icon with descriptive text and aria labels for clarity.
ðŸ›¡ï¸ User management now uses a Radix dialog modal before deleting a user, keeping the inline list focused and consistent with the rest of the dashboard.
ðŸ“ˆ Admin stats/logs/widgets stay in sync with new user data, exposing inline role switches, last-activity timestamps, and actions guarded by admin middleware.

title: Ops: Admin action audit logs
description: Audit admin actions (user create/delete) to a separate admin log file for easier review and compliance.
details: ðŸ—„ï¸ Admin Audit Logs: Admin actions (create/delete users) are now written to `./logs/path-ai-admin-YYYY-MM-DD.log`
ðŸ” Exposed via admin endpoint: `GET /api/admin/logs?type=admin&date=YYYY-MM-DD` (admin-only)
ðŸ§¾ Entries include actor (user email/id when available), target info, roles, and IP for forensic review.

title: Hotfix: Defused Preflight, CORS Headshots & LAN Ops
description: Counter-Strike style ops: we defused the CORS bomb, cleared the smoke, and planted a health endpoint for quick LAN checks (gg).
details: ðŸ’¥ HEADSHOT: Fixed CORS preflight handling (explicit methods/allowedHeaders + optionsSuccessStatus) so credentialed cross-origin logins don't get vaporized.
ðŸ›¡ï¸ DEFUSE KIT: Replaced brittle app.options('*') wildcard with an Express5-safe regex handler to avoid path-to-regexp crashes ('Missing parameter name at index 1').
ðŸš¦ SMOKE CLEARED: Expanded and de-duplicated allowed origin list (http/https + common dev ports), and added clearer allow/deny logging for debugging cross-device testing.
â¤ï¸ HEALTH PLANTED: Added lightweight `/api/health` endpoint for quick LAN reachability checks â€” perfect for 'pinging' from other devices before the round starts.
ðŸ” COOKIE TWEAK: Set `refreshToken` cookie SameSite='None' (Secure in prod) so browsers accept it with `fetch(..., credentials: 'include')` during cross-origin flows.
ðŸ§ª DEBUG GEAR: Added admin-only API test widget to the Dashboard (moved to the end of the page) and frontend logs to show the computed API URL while debugging.
ðŸ•µï¸ ONBOARDING FORensics: Logged onboarding payloads and stored user fields server-side and added a debug view in the Onboarding Editor to track native/preferred language swaps.
ðŸ” REBUILT & QA: Rebuilt backend after fixes; fixed various dev-server env issues (VITE_API_URL switched to LAN IP for easier multi-device testing).
ðŸ STATUS: Bomb defused â€” Preflight secured (Counter-Terrorists: 1, CORS: 0). gg ðŸ‘

title: Ops: Admin Logs Endpoint, Startup Banner & Auth Fallback
description: Operational improvements: admin log download, startup discovery banner, and more robust admin authentication.
details: ðŸ—„ï¸ Admin Logs Endpoint: Added `GET /api/admin/logs?type=critical|general&date=YYYY-MM-DD` for admins to download logs (streams file as attachment).
ðŸ“£ Startup Banner: Server startup prints a concise banner with version, timestamp, routes and log file paths for easier discovery during debugging and ops.
ðŸ” Auth Fallback: `authMiddleware` now accepts a `refreshToken` cookie as a fallback when the Authorization header is missing (useful for Postman or cookie-based flows).
ðŸ” Admin Guard Improvements: `adminOnly` now logs denied requests and successful grants to aid debugging of access issues.
ðŸ§ª QA: Added testability notes in `INTERACTION_TRACKING_GUIDE.md` and included Postman examples for admin log downloads.

title: Patch: Instrumentation, Postman Collection & Critical Logging
description: Added operational tooling and instrumentation: Postman collection, admin guards, frontend tracking hooks, and separate critical logs for fast triage.
details: ðŸ§­ Postman Collection: Added `postman/InteractionTracking.postman_collection.json` with requests and Runner-ready setups to simulate interactions and suspicious behaviors.
ðŸ” Admin Guard: Restricted `/api/interactions/report/suspicious` to admins via `adminOnly` middleware to prevent data leakage.
ðŸ“¡ Frontend Instrumentation: Wired tracking calls into key components (topic click, topic complete, bookmark add/remove, timer start/stop) to emit interactions automatically.

ðŸ› ï¸ Console & File Logging: Added daily rotating log files (general and `-critical` files) and `critical()` helper for urgent entries; login failures and suspicious/high-risk events now write to the critical log for quick lookup.
âœ… Documentation: Updated `INTERACTION_TRACKING_GUIDE.md` with testing instructions and examples for Postman and critical log checks.
ðŸ§ª Testing: Added Postman collection and initial instrumentation so QA can reproduce scenarios (rapid clicks, batch completes, timestamp drift) via Runner.
ðŸ’¡ Operation: Critical events are stored under `./logs/path-ai-critical-YYYY-MM-DD.log` and general logs under `./logs/path-ai-YYYY-MM-DD.log` for forensic analysis.

title: Major: Comprehensive User Interaction Tracking & Behavior Analytics System
description: Major architectural upgrade introducing complete interaction tracking, real-time behavioral analysis, and multi-layer cheating detection to monitor learning habits and prevent system gaming.
details: ðŸŽ¯ Core Tracking Architecture: Created persistent `UserInteraction` MongoDB model capturing all essential user actions with full context, timestamps, metadata (IP, user agent), and suspicious flags.
ðŸ“Š Backend Analytics Engine: Built sophisticated analytics utility analyzing user behavior patterns across 7+ action types with temporal analysis and statistical correlation.

ðŸ” Multi-Layer Cheating Detection: Implemented 5-tier detection system identifying: rapid topic clicks (>15/min), impossible durations (>12h sessions), timestamp drift (Â±5min), batch completions (<2s apart), and missing learning sessions.
âš–ï¸ Risk Assessment System: Evaluates holistic user behavior returning risk levels (low/medium/high) with evidence scores and actionable recommendations for manual review.

ðŸ“¡ Complete REST API: New `/api/interactions` endpoint family: POST /track (log interaction), GET /stats (user analytics), GET /risk-assessment (cheat detection), GET /user/:id (history), GET /report/suspicious (admin report).
âœ… Full Input Validation: Added Zod schema validation for all tracking payloads with strict typing and sanitization via middleware.
ðŸŽ¨ Frontend Analytics Service: Built high-performance singleton tracker with automatic batching (30s interval or 50-item threshold) for minimal API overhead.
ðŸ”— Semantic Event Helpers: 8+ convenience functions for tracking specific actions (topicCompletion, bookmarkAction, timerEvents, themeGeneration, etc.) with pre-filled context.
ðŸ’¾ Audit Trail: Complete interaction history stored with rich context (topic, duration, learning path, goal) enabling forensic analysis of user behavior.
âš¡ Performance Optimized: Batched sending, async processing, graceful degradation without auth token prevents tracking from impacting user experience.
ðŸ” Privacy Conscious: Tracking disabled without auth, can be toggled via tracker.disable(), stored locally before batch send, proper error handling prevents data loss.

title: Fix: Timer Navigation from Learning Mode
description: Fixed timer button accessibility issue when navigating from learning mode or PATH AI sections.
details: Fixed bug where timer button (â±ï¸ icon) in header was non-functional when in learning mode.
Root cause: Header component was not receiving `setShowTimer` prop when dashboard mode was set.
Updated App.tsx to pass `setShowTimer` to Header in all dashboard mode branches, ensuring timer button works everywhere.
Enhanced timer button handler to also clear `dashboardMode` state, ensuring clean navigation from learning/statistics modes.
Renamed back button text from 'Back to Dashboard' to 'Back to Overview' for clearer UX language.
Timer page is now accessible from any mode: dashboard selection, learning (PATH AI), statistics, and completed topics.

title: Security: Timer Input Validation & Sanitization
description: Hardened the timer controller against injection attacks and malformed input.
details: Added comprehensive Zod schema validation for timer session start endpoint: `TimerStartSessionSchema`.
Implemented strict type checking for 'goal' parameter: string type, max 200 characters, no HTML tags.
Added automatic whitespace trimming for goal and learningPath inputs to prevent log pollution.
Validates learningPath parameter with same constraints: max 200 characters, no HTML tags, optional but validated if provided.
Rejects any attempt to inject HTML, SQL, or other malicious patterns via regex validation.
Moved validation to middleware layer for consistent enforcement across all requests.
Prevents extremely long strings, special character injection, and potential XSS attacks in session data.

title: Feature: Pomodoro Templates for Quick Session Setup
description: Added pre-configured Pomodoro session templates to help users instantly choose their focus intensity.
details: Introduced 'Quick Focus' (1Ã—25m), 'Deep Work' (3Ã—25m), and 'Marathon Session' (5Ã—25m) templates.
Templates automatically set learning time goals when selected, eliminating manual configuration.
Disabled Pomodoro template selection while a timer is actively running to prevent mid-session confusion.
Added a helpful ðŸ’¡ tip explaining how to use the templates effectively.
Integrated widget into the left sidebar of the Timer Page for maximum visibility.

title: UX: Seamless Navigation & Focus Mode Integration
description: Integrated Focus Mode into the main dashboard selection and improved navigation flow.
details: Added a dedicated 'Focus Mode' widget to the Dashboard Selection screen for quick access to the timer.
Implemented a 'Back to Dashboard' button in the Timer Page to prevent users from getting stuck in the focus dimension.
Refactored `App.tsx` to manage timer visibility state more effectively and fixed some syntax gremlins.

title: Refactor: Timer Dashboard & Session History
description: Deconstructed the Timer Page into reusable widgets and added comprehensive session history tracking.
details: Refactored `TimerPage` into modular components: `TimerWidget`, `CurrentPathWidget`, `RecentSessionsWidget`, and `SessionHistoryWidget`.
Added a 'Recent Sessions' widget to show the last 3 learning bouts at a glance.
Implemented a full 'Session History' table to audit every second of your learning journey.
Improved code maintainability by decoupling timer logic from the page layout.

title: Feature: Rip and Tea--- I mean: Timer... Until It Is Learned!
description: The Timer Slayer has entered the facility. Time goals are locked and loaded, and your learning sessions are eternally recorded in the database of doom.
details: Fixed the broken timer navigation. The portal to the Timer Dimension now opens correctly. No more stuck doors.
Implemented Time Goals. Set your target, lock in, and destroy your ignorance.
Added Learning Path context. The system now knows exactly which demon... er, topic you are slaying.
Backend Persistence: Your battle history is now etched into the MongoDB monolith. Statistics endpoints are online and waiting to judge your performance.
Statistics Dashboard Integration: The 'Your Journey to Success' page now summons real data from the void. Total minutes, session counts, and average engagement are no longer illusions.

title: UX: Enhanced Language Selection
description: Improved onboarding language selection with a visual grid of flags and expanded language options
details: Replaced native select dropdowns in onboarding with a responsive grid of selectable buttons for better UX
Expanded language options to 28+ languages including Asian, European, and Middle Eastern variants
Added flag emojis to each language option for quick visual recognition
Improved visual feedback for selected states with primary color highlighting and checkmarks

title: SEO & Accessibility Polish
description: Added SEO meta tags, Open Graph support for GitHub/Discord, and fixed missing accessible names for icon buttons
details: Added comprehensive SEO meta tags (description, keywords, author) to index.html for better crawler visibility
Implemented Open Graph (og:*) tags to support rich link previews on GitHub, Discord, and other platforms
Fixed accessibility issues by adding descriptive `aria-label` attributes to icon-only buttons in Header, LearnWidget, and subtopic lists
Ensured screen readers announce meaningful actions (e.g., 'Toggle theme', 'Mark as learned') instead of generic 'button'

title: Refactor: Code quality improvements & accessibility enhancements
description: Extracted duplicate event dispatch logic and added WCAG 2.1 Level AA aria-labels to all icon-only buttons across the codebase
details: Created `frontend/src/utils/events.ts` with `dispatchCustomEvent()` helper to centralize CustomEvent dispatch logic and replace 4 instances of duplicated try-catch patterns
Eliminated duplicate CustomEvent dispatch code in WhatsNewWidget, CompletedPathsWidget, and their event listeners >> cause copilot blamed me
THEREFORE: Added aria-label attributes to 24 (!!!) icon-only buttons across dashboard components and pages for full WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance (uhh that just sounds fancy)
Updated components: WhatsNewWidget, CompletedPathsWidget, BookmarksWidget, SavedThemesWidget, DashboardPreview, TemplatesPage, TemplatesPage.clean, OpenTopicsPage, and ProgressWidget
Improved code maintainability and reduced duplication (DRY principle) â€” event dispatch now has a single source of truth
All accessibility labels follow semantic patterns: action + context (e.g., 'Generate subtopics for {title}', 'Remove {title} from bookmarks')

title: Release: Onboarding language, LLM prefs, and onboarding UX improvements
description: Added language pre-selection, made onboarding easier to navigate and save, and wired LLM prompts to user preferences
details: Added a 'Language' pre-selection step (step 1) so users can choose native and preferred Path AI language up-front
Made onboarding progress icons clickable and keyboard accessible so users can jump to any step
Added a global 'Save' button in the onboarding navigation so preferences can be persisted from any step
Learn widget now resolves the LLM language at runtime from user onboarding settings (preferredLanguage) via `getPreferredLanguage()`
Fixed onboarding editor issues (no mutation of reactive data, avoided synchronous setState in effects)
Added a small `frontend/scripts/validate-steps.cjs` check and `npm run check:steps` script to ensure onboarding step ids remain unique
Small UI polish & component extractions: `WhatsNew` uses an `IconButton` for 'View all', bookmarks/completed paths widgets extracted for clarity

title: Feature: VersionIndicator hover backend health check
description: Runs a lightweight backend health check when hovering the VersionIndicator and surfaces status in the tooltip
details: Performs an inexpensive GET to /api/changelog/latest on hover and throttles checks to once every 10s
Updates the small status dot (green=up, red=down, muted=unknown) based on the result
Shows backend status text in the hover tooltip and handles failures gracefully
Recommendation: add a dedicated /api/health endpoint in the future for an even lighter check

title: Tweak: icon-button desaturation & streak integration
description: Fine-tuned `IconButton` behavior and applied it to streak widgets for consistent UX
details: Reduced default desaturation to 30% for `IconButton` so idle icons are subtly muted (not fully grayscale)
Applied `IconButton` to Compact and Enhanced Streak widgets so their header icons follow the same hover/focus logic
Fixed import paths and ensured consistent w-12/w-6 sizing across widget headers
Small bug fixes and style polish across dashboard widgets

title: Refactor: more widget polish
description: Further improved dashboard widgets for better UX and added dynamic changelog statistics
details: Refactored icon styling in dashboard widgets to use consistent sizes and colors, improving visual harmony
Enhanced hover effects on widget action buttons for better interactivity feedback

title: Fix: widget polish & stats card
description: Polished dashboard widgets (fixed duplicated actions, alignment) and added dynamic changelog statistics
details: Fixed duplicated action buttons in 'last 3 bookmarks' â€” now icon-only actions are shown and the badge appears before the title
Restored compact single-row layout: badge + title + icon-only actions aligned in the same div
Added icon-only quick actions to 'Lastly completed learning paths' (generate subtopics, revisit/set current, and 'view all completed topics')
Wired 'view all completed topics' to dispatch a global event so the app opens the Completed Topics page from widgets
Ensured hover visibility for action icons by adding Tailwind `group` semantics and subtle hover affordances
Added `ChangelogStatsCard` that computes fun, live stats from backend `changelog.json` (total versions, avg cadence, top title word, Fix/Feature counts)

title: UI: dashboard widgets & quick actions
description: Improved dashboard widgets for faster access: 'What's New' view, bookmark actions, and completed topics shortcuts
details: Added 'View all' link to 'What's New' widget that opens the full changelog
Updated 'last 3 bookmarks' widget: moved badge before title, restored compact layout, and added icon-only quick actions (subtopics, set current, mark learned, remove)
Made bookmark action buttons consistent with `SavedThemesWidget` and visible on hover (uses tailwind `group`/`group-hover` semantics)
Updated 'Lastly completed learning paths' widget: badge-before-title layout and icon-only actions (generate subtopics, revisit/set current and 'view all completed topics')
Wired 'view all completed topics' to dispatch a global event so the app opens the Completed Topics view from widget actions
Minor UX polish: hover affordances, alignment fixes, and subtle hover shadow for interactive rows

title: Fix: storage & auth sync improvements
description: Added local storage option, improved auth cross-tab sync and token refresh, and enhanced startup logging
details: Added STORAGE_DRIVER local option and `deleteFromStorage` + storage util
Implemented local disk uploads (multer.diskStorage) and static `/uploads` serving
Added migration script to rehost Cloudinary videos to local storage
Improved auth state handling: cross-tab sync (storage events), same-tab authChanged event, and refresh-token retry on 401
Added startup logs showing active storage driver and enumerated available routes
FINALLY fixed widgets that required ANNOYING manual page refresh after login by making auth-driven data fetching reactive

title: refactored console logs
description: Improved logging consistency and clarity across backend
details: Replaced console.log with logger utility
Added color coding to log levels
Implemented log filtering logic
Enhanced logging for better user experience

title: local file storage options
description: added local file storage option alongside cloudinary
details: added STORAGE_DRIVER env variable to switch between 'cloudinary' and 'local'
implemented local file storage logic in storage utility
updated file upload and deletion middleware to support both storage methods

title: Landing Page Refactor
description: Complete overhaul of landing page content to match real app features
details: Refactored Hero, Features, Gamification, and DashboardPreview components
Updated PromptTemplates to use real learning templates
Externalized changelog data to JSON file
Updated translations and fixed UI consistency

title: Fix: onboarding data save issue
description: Resolved problem with onboarding data not saving correctly
details: Fixed bug in onboarding wizard data persistence
Ensured user preferences are stored after onboarding completion

title: Feature: header UI update
description: updated header elements to match new branding
details: Refactored header layout to use a unified, centered design
Integrated app title and user greeting into the user panel widget
Removed legacy background effects and optimized responsive behavior

title: Feature cleanup / move
description: Removed active Video Studio / Video Translation feature
details: Future of video features to be re-evaluated after MVP launch
Fork now represents enhanced refactor of originally next.js-built LearnBuddy AI app
Original video features archived in src/experimental folder
Removed video-player and translation widgets, replaced with lightweight wrappers
Removed video env keys and config from references

title: UI & translations update
description: Removed explicit video copy, replaced with neutral terms
details: Updated hero, features, language features, prompt templates
Replaced video references with content/resources/media terms
Updated landing copy and dashboard preview
Updated onboarding item IDs

title: FormattedText component enhancement
description: Applied FormattedText to SavedThemesWidget
details: Consistent markdown rendering across components

title: Learn widget improvements
description: Added FormattedText component for bold markdown
details: Enhanced learn widget results rendering

title: Logging infrastructure refactor
description: Refactored console logs to use logger utility
details: Added color coding to logs
Implemented filter logic in frontend

title: LLM provider selection
description: New feature: Choose between Google Gemini or local Ollama
details: LLM provider can be configured via .env
Backend proxy handles both providers

title: Video & Store modules added
description: Added video player and store functionality
details: Video player component
Store module with inventory system

title: Environment configuration
description: Outsourced sensitive data to .env files
details: Frontend configuration via .env
Better security practices

title: Version indicator added
description: Added version indicator to UI
details: Version badge in footer
Hover tooltip with details
